text: Dave's World is a CBS sitcom that aired from September 20, 1993 to June 27, 1997 for four seasons and 98 episodes. It was based on the stories by Dave Barry. It stars Harry Anderson, DeLane Matthews, Shadoe Stevens, Meshach Taylor, Patrick Warburton, Tammy Lauren and Bea Arthur. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1993 American television series debuts Category:1997 American television series endings Category:CBS network shows
title: Dave's World
